attributes.action: Actually listen to the people! To make a start, how about abolishing the 'election tax' AKA the deposit for election candidates. It serves to prevent choice, something which, in a democracy, we should be promoting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently it costs £500 for general elections and £1000 for European. It simply prevents people from standing in elections. This is the most undemocratic tax of all!
Apparently it is to 'discourage non serious nominations' Surely it's up to the electorate to decide who's serious and who isn't?
Just consider: If you have a spare £500 you can dress up as a lobster and get on TV... what a great democracy!
Abolish the election tax!
